subtitle.translate: Required to create a connection between to Quantum Network Bridges.

description: # &&eNo This Is Not The MI Questline.
/b/Quantum Enatngled Singularitys/b/ are required to create a connection between to /6/Quantum Network Bridges/6/.
They are always produced in matching pairs, to create a connection place 1 of the pair of /b/Quantum Entangled Singularity/b/ into the /b/ME Quantum Link Chamber/b/ of the bridge on each side.
They are crafted by causing a reaction between /b/Ender Pearl/b/ or /b/Ender Dust/b/ and a /b/Singularity/b/./6/ Any explosive force should be enough to trigger the reaction/6/.
Nearly any explosion - even creepers - will work.
Always produced in pairs, but only require a single Singularity.
It might be a good idea to label these with names when you create them using the vanilla anvil.
